title: Lynda.com - Apple Color Essential Training
description:
Color is part of the Final Cut Studio suite of applications by Apple  <a href="
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/color/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/color/</a>


Video Tutorial

Apple Color Essential Training 
with: Robbie Carman 


In Apple Color Essential Training, Color expert Robbie Carman delves into the program's powerful features. Beginning with the fundamentals of digital color correction and preparing a Final Cut sequence for gradation in Color, Robbie goes on to teach advanced features such as evaluating contrast and color with scopes, making primary corrections with the color balance controls and curves, making secondary corrections, building Color FX, changing corrections over time, and using multiple grades. 


**PLEASE NOTE: TUTORIAL ONLY - EXERCISE FILES ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH THIS TORRENT**


Topics include: 

Introduction 
Basics of Color Correction 
Understanding Color Workflows 
How Color Thinks 
Using the Scopes 
Primary In Corrections 
Secondary Corrections 
Color FX 
Pan and Scan and Tracking 
Primary Out 
Grade Management and Scene-to-Scene Color Corrections 
Changing Color Over Time 
Rendering and Outputting Files
Conclusion


For more info: <a href=" http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=516" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=516</a>

Hope you enjoy!
